gatewayIds.description: The array of resource Ids of gateway to integrate with API portal.

httpsOnly.description: Indicate if only https is allowed.

public.description: Indicates whether the API portal exposes endpoint.

sourceUrls.description: Collection of OpenAPI source URL locations.

ApplicationInsightsAgentVersions.description: Application Insights agent versions properties payload

customPersistentDisks.description: Collection of persistent disk resources list and a possible link for next page.

enableEndToEndTLS.description: Indicate if end to end TLS is enabled.

httpsOnly.description: Indicate if only https is allowed.

loadedCertificates.description: Collection of loaded certificate resources list and a possible link for next page.

public.description: Indicates whether the App exposes public endpoint

vnetAddons.description: Additional App settings in vnet injection instance

publicEndpoint.description: Indicates whether the App in vnet injection instance exposes endpoint which could be accessed from internet.

AppVNetAddons.description: Additional App settings in vnet injection instance

shareName.description: The share name of the Azure File share.

AzureFileVolume.description: The properties of the Azure File volume. Azure File shares are mounted as volumes.

bindingParameters.description: Binding parameters of the Binding resource

key.description: The key of the bound resource

resourceId.description: The Azure resource id of the bound resource

name.description: Buildpack group name

BuildpacksGroupProperties.description: Buildpack group properties of the Builder

agentPool.description: The resource id of agent pool

builder.description: The resource id of builder to build the source code

env.description: The environment variables for this build

relativePath.description: The relative path of source code

resourceRequests.description: Resource request payload of Build Resource.

triggeredBuildResult.description: The build result triggered by a build

cpu.description:
Optional Cpu allocated to the build resource. 1 core can be represented by 1 or 1000m. 
The default value is 1, this should not exceed build service agent pool cpu size.

memory.description:
Optional Memory allocated to the build resource. 1 GB can be represented by 1Gi or 1024Mi. 
The default value is 2Gi, this should not exceed build service agent pool memory size.

BuildResourceRequests.description: Resource request payload of Build Resource.

buildResultId.description: Resource id of an existing succeeded build result under the same Spring instance.

poolSize.description: Build service agent pool size properties

name.description: The name of build service agent pool size

BuildServiceAgentPoolSizeProperties.description: Build service agent pool size properties

vnetAddons.description: Additional Service settings in vnet injection instance

password.description: Password of git repository basic auth.

privateKey.description: Private sshKey algorithm of git repository.

strictHostKeyChecking.description: Strict host key checking or not.

username.description: Username of git repository basic auth.

error.description: The error code compose of code and message.

repositories.description: Repositories of Application Configuration Service git property.

name.description: Name of the repository

password.description: Password of git repository basic auth.

patterns.description: Collection of patterns of the repository

privateKey.description: Private sshKey algorithm of git repository.

strictHostKeyChecking.description: Strict host key checking or not.

username.description: Username of git repository basic auth.

ConfigurationServiceGitRepository.description: Git repository property payload for Application Configuration Service

resourceRequests.description: Resource request payload of Application Configuration Service

settings.description: The settings of Application Configuration Service.

ConfigurationServiceResourceRequests.description: Resource request payload of Application Configuration Service

ConfigurationServiceSettings.description: The settings of Application Configuration Service.

disableProbe.description: Indicates whether disable the liveness and readiness probe

ContainerProbeSettings.description: Container liveness and readiness probe settings

ContentCertificateProperties.description: Properties of certificate imported from key vault.

args.description: Arguments to the entrypoint. The docker image's CMD is used if this is not provided.

command.description: Entrypoint array. Not executed within a shell. The docker image's ENTRYPOINT is used if this is not provided.

containerImage.description: Container image of the custom container. This should be in the form of <repository>:<tag> without the server name of the registry

languageFramework.description: Language framework of the container image uploaded

server.description: The name of the registry that contains the container image

certName.description: The bound certificate name of domain.

CustomDomainProperties.description: Custom domain of app resource payload.

mountOptions.description: These are the mount options for a persistent disk.

mountPath.description: The mount path of the persistent disk.

readOnly.description: Indicates whether the persistent disk is a readOnly one.

storageId.description: The resource id of Azure Spring Apps Storage resource.

active.description: Indicates whether the Deployment is active

containerProbeSettings.description: Container liveness and readiness probe settings

livenessProbe.description: Probe describes a health check to be performed against an App Instance to determine whether it is alive or ready to receive traffic.

readinessProbe.description: Probe describes a health check to be performed against an App Instance to determine whether it is alive or ready to receive traffic.

startupProbe.description: Probe describes a health check to be performed against an App Instance to determine whether it is alive or ready to receive traffic.

terminationGracePeriodSeconds.description: Optional duration in seconds the App Instance needs to terminate gracefully. May be decreased in delete request. Value must be non-negative integer. The value zero indicates stop immediately via the kill signal (no opportunity to shut down). If this value is nil, the default grace period will be used instead. The grace period is the duration in seconds after the processes running in the App Instance are sent a termination signal and the time when the processes are forcibly halted with a kill signal. Set this value longer than the expected cleanup time for your process. Defaults to 90 seconds.

Error.description: The error code compose of code and message.

command.description: Command is the command line to execute inside the container, the working directory for the command is root ('/') in the container's filesystem. The command is not run inside a shell, so traditional shell instructions ('|', etc) won't work. To use a shell, you need to explicitly call out to that shell. Exit status of 0 is treated as live/healthy and non-zero is unhealthy.

ExecAction.description: ExecAction describes a "run in container" action.

description.description: Detailed description of the APIs available on the Gateway instance (default: `Generated OpenAPI 3 document that describes the API routes configured.`)

documentation.description: Location of additional documentation for the APIs available on the Gateway instance

serverUrl.description: Base URL that API consumers will use to access APIs on the Gateway instance.

title.description: Title describing the context of the APIs available on the Gateway instance (default: `Spring Cloud Gateway for K8S`)

version.description: Version of APIs available on this Gateway instance (default: `unspecified`).

GatewayApiMetadataProperties.description: API metadata property for Spring Cloud Gateway

description.description: A description, will be applied to methods in the generated OpenAPI documentation.

filters.description: To modify the request before sending it to the target endpoint, or the received response.

predicates.description: A number of conditions to evaluate a route for each request. Each predicate may be evaluated against request headers and parameter values. All of the predicates associated with a route must evaluate to true for the route to be matched to the request.

tags.description: Classification tags, will be applied to methods in the generated OpenAPI documentation.

title.description: A title, will be applied to methods in the generated OpenAPI documentation.

tokenRelay.description: Pass currently-authenticated user's identity token to application service, default is 'false'

GatewayApiRoute.description: API route config of the Spring Cloud Gateway

allowCredentials.description: Whether user credentials are supported on cross-site requests. Valid values: `true`, `false`.

allowedHeaders.description: Allowed headers in cross-site requests. The special value `*` allows actual requests to send any header.

allowedMethods.description: Allowed HTTP methods on cross-site requests. The special value `*` allows all methods. If not set, `GET` and `HEAD` are allowed by default.

allowedOrigins.description: Allowed origins to make cross-site requests. The special value `*` allows all domains.

exposedHeaders.description: HTTP response headers to expose for cross-site requests.

maxAge.description: How long, in seconds, the response from a pre-flight request can be cached by clients.

GatewayCustomDomainProperties.description: The properties of custom domain for Spring Cloud Gateway

apiMetadataProperties.description: API metadata property for Spring Cloud Gateway

httpsOnly.description: Indicate if only https is allowed.

public.description: Indicates whether the Spring Cloud Gateway exposes endpoint.

resourceRequests.description: Resource request payload of Spring Cloud Gateway.

cpu.description: Cpu allocated to each Spring Cloud Gateway instance.

memory.description: Memory allocated to each Spring Cloud Gateway instance.

GatewayResourceRequests.description: Resource request payload of Spring Cloud Gateway.

GatewayRouteConfigOpenApiProperties.description: OpenAPI properties of Spring Cloud Gateway route config.

appResourceId.description: The resource Id of the Azure Spring Apps app, required unless route defines `uri`.

openApi.description: OpenAPI properties of Spring Cloud Gateway route config.

protocol.description: Protocol of routed Azure Spring Apps applications.

routes.description: Array of API routes, each route contains properties such as `title`, `uri`, `ssoEnabled`, `predicates`, `filters`.

GatewayRouteConfigProperties.description: API route config of the Spring Cloud Gateway

name.description: Name of the repository

password.description: Password of git repository basic auth.

pattern.description: Collection of pattern of the repository

privateKey.description: Private sshKey algorithm of git repository.

strictHostKeyChecking.description: Strict host key checking or not.

username.description: Username of git repository basic auth.

GitPatternRepository.description: Git repository property payload for config server

path.description: Path to access on the HTTP server.

scheme.description:
Scheme to use for connecting to the host. Defaults to HTTP.

Possible enum values:
 - `"HTTP"` means that the scheme used will be http://
 - `"HTTPS"` means that the scheme used will be https://.

HTTPGetAction.description: HTTPGetAction describes an action based on HTTP Get requests.

password.description: The password of the image registry credential

username.description: The username of the image registry credential

readTimeoutInSeconds.description: Ingress read time out in seconds.

IngressConfig.description: Ingress configuration payload for Azure Spring Apps resource.

backendProtocol.description: How ingress should communicate with this app backend service.

readTimeoutInSeconds.description: Ingress read time out in seconds.

sendTimeoutInSeconds.description: Ingress send time out in seconds.

sessionAffinity.description: Type of the affinity, set this to Cookie to enable session affinity.

sessionCookieMaxAge.description: Time in seconds until the cookie expires.

runtimeVersion.description: Runtime version of the Jar file

JarUploadedUserSourceInfo.description: Uploaded Jar binary for a deployment

certVersion.description: The certificate version of key vault.

excludePrivateKey.description: Optional. If set to true, it will not import private key from key vault.

keyVaultCertName.description: The certificate name of key vault.

vaultUri.description: The vault uri of user key vault.

KeyVaultCertificateProperties.description: Properties of certificate imported from key vault.

loadTrustStore.description: Indicate whether the certificate will be loaded into default trust store, only work for Java runtime.

principalId.description: Principal Id of system-assigned managed identity.

tenantId.description: Tenant Id of system-assigned managed identity.

userAssignedIdentities.description: User-assigned managed identities in key-value map. The key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}'.

ManagedIdentityProperties.description: Managed identity properties retrieved from ARM request headers.

appInsightsAgentVersions.description: Application Insights agent versions properties payload

appInsightsInstrumentationKey.description: Target application insight instrumentation key, null or whitespace include empty will disable monitoringSettings

appInsightsSamplingRate.description: Indicates the sampling rate of application insight agent, should be in range [0.0, 100.0]

error.description: The error code compose of code and message.

traceEnabled.description: Indicates whether enable the trace functionality, which will be deprecated since api version 2020-11-01-preview. Please leverage appInsightsInstrumentationKey to indicate if monitoringSettings enabled or not

netCoreMainEntryPath.description: The path to the .NET executable relative to zip root

NetCoreZipUploadedUserSourceInfo.description: Uploaded Jar binary for a deployment

appNetworkResourceGroup.description: Name of the resource group containing network resources for customer apps in Azure Spring Apps

appSubnetId.description: Fully qualified resource Id of the subnet to host customer apps in Azure Spring Apps

ingressConfig.description: Ingress configuration payload for Azure Spring Apps resource.

outboundType.description: The egress traffic type of Azure Spring Apps VNet instances.

serviceCidr.description: Azure Spring Apps service reserved CIDR

serviceRuntimeNetworkResourceGroup.description: Name of the resource group containing network resources of Azure Spring Apps Service Runtime

serviceRuntimeSubnetId.description: Fully qualified resource Id of the subnet to host Azure Spring Apps Service Runtime

mountPath.description: Mount path of the persistent disk

sizeInGB.description: Size of the persistent disk in GB

disableProbe.description: Indicate whether the probe is disabled.

failureThreshold.description: Minimum consecutive failures for the probe to be considered failed after having succeeded. Minimum value is 1.

initialDelaySeconds.description: Number of seconds after the App Instance has started before probes are initiated. More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/workloads/pods/pod-lifecycle#container-probes

periodSeconds.description: How often (in seconds) to perform the probe. Minimum value is 1.

successThreshold.description: Minimum consecutive successes for the probe to be considered successful after having failed. Must be 1 for liveness and startup. Minimum value is 1.

timeoutSeconds.description: Number of seconds after which the probe times out. Minimum value is 1.

Probe.description: Probe describes a health check to be performed against an App Instance to determine whether it is alive or ready to receive traffic.

cpu.description: Required CPU. 1 core can be represented by 1 or 1000m. This should be 500m or 1 for Basic tier, and {500m, 1, 2, 3, 4} for Standard tier.

memory.description: Required memory. 1 GB can be represented by 1Gi or 1024Mi. This should be {512Mi, 1Gi, 2Gi} for Basic tier, and {512Mi, 1Gi, 2Gi, ..., 8Gi} for Standard tier.

logStreamPublicEndpoint.description: Indicates whether the log stream in vnet injection instance could be accessed from internet.

ServiceVNetAddons.description: Additional Service settings in vnet injection instance

capacity.description: Current capacity of the target resource

name.description: Name of the Sku

artifactSelector.description:

the relative path to the target module/project.
